list.title: Landing Page
list.desc: Develop an engaging landing page to educate users about the product and strengthen brand identity.

list.title: Sign Up
list.desc: Enable users to connect their devices and link them to their wallets seamlessly.

list.title: Points
list.desc: Introduce a Points system to incentivize users to engage with the app and reward them for their loyalty.

list.title: Node Infrastructure
list.desc: Initiate the development of node execution infrastructure and determine node requirements.

list.title: Cluster Management
list.desc: Implement Kubernetes cluster management to connect workers(GPUs) and monitor their activity.

list.title: Distributed Training
list.desc: Design a system to distribute training loads across cluster workers.

list.title: TensorFlow and PyTorch Support
list.desc: Integrate support for these popular machine learning libraries.

list.title: Order Handling
list.desc: Construct a matching engine for order placement, acceptance, and processing by nodes.

list.title: Payments
list.desc: Enable payments in USD and native tokens for compute jobs.

list.title: Testnet Deployment
list.desc: Launch a testnet to evaluate system performance in a production-like environment.

list.title: Proof of Training
list.desc: Implement consise proofs of training to verify the integrity of the training process.

list.title: Blockchain Explorer
list.desc: Develop a blockchain explorer to monitor network activity and track transactions.

list.title: Mainnet Alpha
list.desc: Release an Alpha version on the mainnet with real payment capabilities.

list.title: Slashing and Dispute Resolutions
list.desc: Implement slashing conditions for misbehaving validators and establish conflict resolution mechanisms.

list.title: Governance
list.desc: Develop a governance structure for network updates.

list.title: Full Mainnet Launch
list.desc: Complete the transition to a fully operational mainnet.
